entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
